lessonsLearned.lesson: PRD can contain duplicate/near-duplicate stories (US-001, US-002, US-003, US-004 all modified the same file). Always verify existing file state before implementing to avoid redundant work.

When detecting project types from config files, check for the most common/specific configs first (package.json, requirements.txt, go.mod) before falling back to glob patterns (*.csproj). Use Set-based lookups for efficient exclusion of directories.
